body_html:
@drpngx it is simply following the current handling of tensorflow, protobuf lib.

If the lib is building for mobile, then lib is stored in a arch-related folder, if is it building for "server-side" (I guess the designer somehow assumed that if it is building for linux/mac, then it is building for host), then the lib is just stored into a "lib" without arch info.

If we want to change them, I think we should change them (including tensorflow, etc.) all together.
